title: 4 years after abrogation of Article 370, SC to decide its fate
selftext:
Rule of thumb whenever Harish Salve is pitched against Kapil Sibal, 
 Salve wins hands down.
comments:
Salve's legal astuteness is no match for Kapil Sibal's legal chattering.

100 sonar ki toh 1 lohar ki, is apt over here.

Salve had spoken about the provisio regarding article 370 on Karan Thapar's show and I feel there it self the fate was sealed.
